short_summary: Fabrication and supply of one 8.0-8.6m rigid hull inflatable boat with enclosed cabin and trailer
description: • FABRICATE AND SUPPLY one 8.0-8.6m rigid hull inflatable boat with enclosed cabin and trailer. • DELIVER the goods to Powell River, British Columbia by March 29, 2025. • PRODUCE goods under Supply Arrangement E60MC-190001.
full_summary:
---

**F1591-240001: 8.0-8.6m Rigid Inflatable Boat Parliament Procurement**

**Tender Announcement**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites proposals from interested suppliers to fabricate and supply an 8.0-8.6 meter, aluminum rigid hull inflatable boat with enclosed cabin and trailer.

**Procurement Details**

* **Tender:** F1591-240001
* **Tender Number:** WS4086986066-Doc4089287870
* **Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 22, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 6, 2023
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia
* **End-User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Supply Arrangement:** E60MC-190001

**Tender Guidance**

The tender is being issued through the Automatic Supplier Notification System (ASNS) with discovery.ariba.com as the electronic tendering portal. Interested suppliers must register with ASNS and access the tender package at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17196369.

**Proposal Requirements**

The successful supplier must provide a rigid hull inflatable boat that meets the specification requirements outlined in the tender package, including delivery to Powell River, British Columbia by March 29, 2025.

**Business Requirements**

The successful supplier must confirm that their goods or services comply with the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact Torrey Buchan at PSPC at torrey
